title: Koadharber
author: Koadharber
created_time: March 31, 2023, 09:11:01 PMLast edit: May 19, 2023, 02:53:09 PM by Koadharber
content: Website | Twitter | Telegram | Discord | Linktree Weekly Report Timeline:Week 1: April 1 to April 7Week 2: April 8 to April 14Week 3: April 15 to April 21Week 4: April 22 to  April 28Week 5: April 29 to  May 5Week 6: May 6 to  May 12Week 7: May 13  to  May 19Week 8: May 20 to  May 26Week 9: May 27 to May 31 Master SpreadsheetGeneral Rules:1. All participants must follow/join all Social Media, Communities of Health Hero, Create an Account on https://gohealthhero.app/. 2. Participants cannot change their wallet address after registration. You need to double-check your wallet address before you register for any campaign.3. Any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign-Using multiple accounts-Cheating-Spamming 4. KYC is not necessary for this campaign.5. All participants must post their Proof of Authentication to join the Bounty ProgramForum accounts with negative trust from DTs are not allowed to join. If you received negative trust while currently active in the campaign, no payment will be made.6. Only 1 forum account per participant. If caught using multiple accounts while enrolled in the campaign, all stakes will be forfeited.7. We reserve the right to change any terms if it's reasonable.8. We reserved the right to remove an ambassador from the campaign for a valid reason.9. We reserved the right to suspend or reduce the allocation on a certain campaign if we found it underperforming.10. We reserve the right to adjust and modify the rules if necessary.11. An Authentication Post in the Bitcointalk forum is necessary for future reference.12. Campaign weekly tasks (1st week and continues) will start on April 1, 12 AM UTC, up to April 7, 23:59 PM UTC.13. Reports will be made in this thread. Quote your previous week report[/size]All participants are required to:1. Create an account on https://gohealthhero.app/2. Connect your wallet3. Connect your IoT if any (additional stakes if you connect) Eligibility: 1. Post your "Authentication Post" in this thread, following the template below:Quote#Authentication PostBitcointalk Profile Link:Twitter Username:Twitter Profile Link:Twitter number of followers:Telegram Username:BSC Address:2. Fill out the Twitter google form: https://forms.gle/9AG92Etydhge2ePi83. Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GoHealthHero4. Only 1 Twitter Account per Bitcointalk user.5. Your Twitter account needs to have at least 85% real followers, verified with https://www.twitteraudit.com/6. The account must be at least one (1) month old.7. Fake, dead, inactive, and bot accounts will not be accepted. It will be strictly checked.8. The followers count will be fixed when you initially register.[/size]Tasks:1. Retweet and Like our posts2. Must post three original tweets about Health Hero using these tags:#HealthHero $HLTHY #HealthtoEarn #H2E #Web3 #crypto #nft #nfts #health #metaverse 3. Minimum of 3 original tweets and three (3) quote retweets with two (2) comments and should be done within the whole week, not just one (1) day.3. The post must remain active until the bounty campaign finishes.4. You have to perform these above tasks one time a day. No spamming.5. Only post/report in this thread once per week. Make a weekly report by posting in this format:QuoteTwitter Profile link:Telegram Username:No. on the spreadsheet:BSC Address:Reports:ReTweets1.2.3......15.Rewards:500 - 999 Followers: 1 Stake / Week1000 - 1999 Followers: 2 Stakes / Week2000 - 2999 Followers: 3 Stakes / Week3000 - 3999: 4 Stakes / Week4000 - 4999: 5 Stakes / Week5001 - 10000 followers: 6 stakes / WeekMore than 10000: 7 stakes Eligibility: 1. Post your "Authentication Post" in this thread, following the template below:Quote#Authentication PostBitcointalk Profile Link:Facebook Profile Link:Facebook number of followers/friends:Telegram Username:BSC Address:2. Fill out the Facebook google form: https://forms.gle/Wh7JhqBETbCNLWVx53. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gohealthhero4. Only one Facebook account per person is allowed.5. The account must be at least one (1) month old.6. Fake, dead, inactive, and bot accounts will not be accepted. It will be strictly checked.7. The followers count will be fixed when you initially register.Tasks:1. Like and share our posts2. Must post three (3) original posts about Health Hero using these tags:#HealthHero $HLTHY #HealthtoEarn #H2E #Web3 #crypto #nft #nfts #health #metaverse 3. Minimum of three (3) original posts and 5 shares should be done within the whole week, not just one (1) day.3. The post must remain active until the bounty campaign finishes.4. You have to perform these above tasks one time a day. No spamming.5. Only post/report in this thread once per week. Make a weekly report by posting in this format:QuoteFacebook Profile link:Telegram Username:No. on the spreadsheet:BSC Address:Reports:Shares1.2.3......15.Rewards:500 - 1000 Followers: 1 Stake / Week1001 - 3000 Followers: 2 Stakes / Week3001 - 5000 Followers: 3 Stakes / Week5001 - 10000: 5 Stakes / WeekMore than 10000: 7 Stakes / Week Eligibility: 1. Post your "Authentication Post" in this thread, following the template below:Quote#Authentication PostBitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:BSC Address:2. Fill out the Telegram google form: https://forms.gle/Xkp6APfHikAzFDia73. Join our Telegram Community: https://t.me/gobyhealthhero4. Only 1 Telegram Account per Bitcointalk user.5. Fake, dead, inactive, and bot accounts will not be accepted. It will be strictly checked.[/size]Tasks:1. All participants must join the Official Telegram group of Health Hero, don't post on the group as it doesn't count for this campaign.2. All Participants must wear an avatar of Health Hero found on the thread and the project name.3. Participate in discussions in other groups ten (10) times per week while wearing the project avatar and name on the profile.4. Posting in dead groups with hashtags isn't allowed; check the spreadsheet for preferable groups to discuss.•No spamming, copy-pasting, or posting, irrespective of positive words; instead, engage in conversation, ask questions, provide answers, etc.Note: All tasks should be done within a minimum of 5 days; using 1-4 days to complete tasks will result in no weekly stakes.5. We'll choose top active users on the Telegram Community every week. 4. You have to perform these above tasks one time a day. No spamming.5. Only post/report in this thread once per week. Make a weekly report by posting in this format:QuoteTwitter Profile link:Telegram Username:No. on the spreadsheet:BSC Address:Reports:1.2.3......10.Rewards:10 Stakes/week (10 posts per week) 5 Stakes each /week for the top 10 most active members on TelegramEligibility: 1. Post your "Authentication Post" in this thread, following the template below:Quote#Authentication PostDiscord Username (ex. Example#1234):Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:BSC Address:2. Fill out the Telegram Google form: https://forms.gle/4MBnupv7hYvi47LX93. Join our Discord Community: discord.gg/gohealthhero4. Only 1 Discord Account per Bitcointalk user.5. Fake, dead, inactive, and bot accounts will not be accepted. It will be strictly checked.[/size]Tasks:1. All participants must join the Official Discord Server of Health Hero.2. All Participants must wear an avatar of Health Hero found on the thread and the project name.3. Participate in discussions in other groups ten (10) times per week while wearing the project avatar and name on the profile.4. Posting in dead groups with hashtags isn't allowed; check the spreadsheet for preferable groups to discuss.•No spamming, copy-pasting, or posting, irrespective of positive words; instead, engage in conversation, ask questions, provide answers, etc.Note: All tasks should be done within a minimum of 5 days; using 1-4 days to complete tasks will result in no weekly stakes.5. We'll choose the top active users on the Discord Community every week. 4. You have to perform these above tasks one time a day. No spamming.5. Only post/report in this thread once per week. Make a weekly report by posting in this format:QuoteTwitter Profile link:Discord Username:No. on the spreadsheet:BSC Address:Reports:1.2.3......10.Rewards:10 Stakes/week (10 posts per week) 5 Stakes each /week for the top 10 most active members on DiscordEligibility: 1. Post your "Authentication Post" in this thread, following the template below:Quote#Authentication PostBitcointalk Profile Link:Youtube Link:TikTok Link:BSC Address:2. Fill out the Youtube google form: https://forms.gle/MQV6VZJRB8E8Gi6193. Subscribe to our Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@Gohealthhero4. Only 1 Youtube/TikTok Account per Bitcointalk user.5. Fake, dead, inactive, and bot accounts will not be accepted. It will be strictly checked.Tasks:Rules:1. Video needs to be a minimum of 3 minutes & must have at least 100 subscribers. Video content must focus on project features, token sales, blockchain, NFT, etc. You can ask mods in the community for more details.2. Video must be in English other local Language is not accepted3. Each participant can send 2 videos only (Youtube & Tiktok)4. Only post/report in this thread once per week. Make a weekly report by posting in this format:Quote Youtube Link:TikTok Link:Telegram Username:No. on the spreadsheet:BSC Address:Reports:1.2.3......10.Rewards:Average quality: 2 StakeGood quality: 4 StakeHigh quality: 6 StakeExcellent quality: 8 Stake
